attributes.action: A public inquiry should be held into MPs expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A public inquiry should be held into expense claims and where false claims have been made a report should be sent to the DPC and action taken by the police if needed

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
